defaultView.description: Default view of cardListLayout, valid values are card or list

tableViewRendered.description: Whether to render table view or not, default is false

pagination.description: Whether to allow pagination to see more cards

pageSize.description: No of cards to be shown per page, default is 15

cardViewClicked.description: Event to be dispatched when card view is clicked

listViewClicked.description: Event to be dispatched when list view is clicked
